title: Simulation-Based Engineering Education: Practice-Oriented Courses Using Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Providing hands-on training for general citizens using simulation tools in engineering. Structuring small-scale practical modules in mobile environments to enhance learning outcomes of theory-centric subjects

learning_goals: Learners can analyze antenna performance based on frequency characteristics using MATLAB-based antenna design tools with over 80% accuracy
Learners achieve proficiency in designing circuits combining over 10 electronic components using the Multisim Live simulator
Learners can operationalize engineering problem-solving processes in three stages (problem definition-modeling-verification) based on simulation results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
